Setting.Name: CssClass
Setting.Help: Sets the CSS class used to render this skin object

Setting.Name: AddImageUrl
Setting.Help: Path to the url to use for the Add Tags link

Setting.Name: CancelImageUrl
Setting.Help: Path to the url to use for the Cancel link

Setting.Name: SaveImageUrl
Setting.Help: Path to the url to use for the Save link

Setting.Name: ShowCategories
Setting.Help: Flag which determines whether the categories are displayed

Setting.Name: ShowTags
Setting.Help: Flag which determines whether the tags are displayed

Setting.Name: Separator
Setting.Help: The text to render between tags and categories

Setting.Name: ObjectType
Setting.Help: The type of object that the skinobject should display tags/categories for. (Page/Module)

Setting.Name: RepeatDirection
Setting.Help: The direction of repreatig elements (Horizontal or Vertical)
